name: .NUS3AUDIO
summary: Learn about .NUS3AUDIO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use the conversion tools available at Smash Ultimate Tools (Web) to convert NUS3AUDIO files to .WAV files. Then, you can play the converted files in any media player, such as VideoLAN VLC media player (cross-platform), Microsoft Windows Media Player (Windows), or Apple QuickTime Player (macOS).
If you want to add a custom NUS3AUDIO file to Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, you can do so by:
Using Smash Ultimate Tools to create a custom NUS3AUDIO file.
Using Sma5hMusic (Windows) to add your custom NUS3AUDIO file to Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.
